sentences.en: a man with nothing much up top.
sentences.cn: 大脑空空的人。

sentences.en: a normal young chap wants to be up and doing.
sentences.cn: 正常的年轻人总想积极向上。

sentences.en: Are you sure you should be up?
sentences.cn: 你肯定你该起床了吗?

sentences.en: bouncing up and down.
sentences.cn: 上下跳动。

sentences.en: Dozens of miles of railway track have been torn up.
sentences.cn: 好几十英里的铁轨被毁坏了。

sentences.en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: he had been up for promotion.
sentences.cn: 他被考虑提升。

sentences.en: he led me up hill and down dale till my feet were dropping off.
sentences.cn: 他领着我到处走，直到我的腿都快断了。

sentences.en: He ordered them to stack up pillows behind his back.
sentences.cn: 他命令他们把几个枕头叠放在自己的背后。

sentences.en: He sweeps up and does a few odds and ends.
sentences.cn: 他扫完地，又干了几样杂活儿。

sentences.en: He was fired from his job after roughing up a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他因为对一位同事动粗而被开除了。

sentences.en: his contract is up for renewal in June.
sentences.cn: 他的合同将在六月到期续签。

sentences.en: How are you Lennox? Good to see you up and about.
sentences.cn: 你怎么样，伦诺克斯？很高兴看到你能下床走动了。

sentences.en: I was laid up in bed with acute rheumatism.
sentences.cn: 我染上了急性风湿，卧病在床。

sentences.en: in clubs up and down the country.
sentences.cn: 在全国各地俱乐部。

sentences.en: Karen lay on her back, staring up at the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 卡伦仰卧着，盯着天花板。

sentences.en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
sentences.cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

sentences.en: my relationship with her was up and down.
sentences.cn: 我和她的关系变化不定。

sentences.en: Nigel was really &B{up for it}, as always.
sentences.cn: 像平常一样，奈吉尔真准备好参加了。

sentences.en: pacing up and down in front of her desk.
sentences.cn: 在她书桌前踱来踱去。

sentences.en: paths leading up into the mountains
sentences.cn: 通往山里的小径

sentences.en: Put up your hand if you know the answer.
sentences.cn: 如果知道答案就举手。

sentences.en: She loved it, this was just up her street.
sentences.cn: 她喜欢这个，这正中她的意。

sentences.en: She picked her jacket up off the floor.
sentences.cn: 她从地板上捡起外套。

sentences.en: the house next door is up for sale.
sentences.cn: 隔壁房子正待出售。

sentences.en: the new computer is up and running.
sentences.cn: 新电脑在运行。

sentences.en: the new computer is up and running.
sentences.cn: 新电脑在运行。

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 最近的一场雨把瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: The shallow sea bed yields up an abundance of food.
sentences.cn: 浅海床提供了丰富的食物。

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: The water was getting up my nose.
sentences.cn: 水已经没到了我的鼻子。

sentences.en: These days they were up at the crack of dawn.
sentences.cn: 这些天他们在破晓时就起床。

sentences.en: they play better when they're up against it.
sentences.cn: 面对困难时，他们打得更好。

sentences.en: Tim had climbed up a tree to get a better view.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆爬到了树上，以便看得更清楚。

sentences.en: We post up a set of rules for the house.
sentences.cn: 我们张贴了一份房屋生活守则。

sentences.en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

sentences.en: We walked slowly up the hill.
sentences.cn: 我们慢慢地爬上山。

sentences.en: we'll have to come up before a magistrate.
sentences.cn: 我们将不得不出庭面对治安法官。

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

phrases.phrase: on the up and up informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)不寻常（或不好）的事发生了
(非正式)面对某种困难，面临某种困境
（睡眠或生病后） 起床；下床

trans.tran_cn: 向上的，上升的，竖立的，垂直的，举起的
trans.tran_en: If you are up, you are not in bed

trans.tran_cn: 在上面，在高处，起床，起来，向上，由低到高
trans.tran_en: towards a higher place or position

trans.tran_cn: 在…的上端，向高处，沿…而去，向…上游

trans.tran_en: used after certain verbs to show that something is completely finished, used, or removed

trans.tran_cn: 增加，加速，提高，举起，拿起
